mapper.sql: id, account, customerName, bank, cardNumber, mobile, status, createTime, balance
mapper.insert: insert into user_card_info (id, account, customerName, bank, cardNumber, mobile, status, createTime, balance) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update user_card_info
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardNumber = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_card_info set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardNumber = #{cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.id, account, customerName, bank, cardNumber, mobile, status, a.createTime, balance, b.text as bankStr from user_card_info a left join sys_code_table b on a.bank = b.typeCode
